segments.text: I have a feeling you will get this job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . But I'm not so sure . Interviews stress me out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just remember to be professional and polite . Oh , and don ’ t forget to smile .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll do my best , but sometimes I have trouble being myself in stressful situations .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you updated your resume recently ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes ... ah ! I forgot to include my e-mail address .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ d better double-and-triple check it . You don ’ t want to have any embarrassing typos on your resume . Otherwise , you might shoot yourself in the foot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll be sure and do that . I also need to pick out the right suit , shirt , and tie for this interview .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Definitely . Oh , do you have a reference letter ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sort of . I prepared a list of all the people who can vouch for my experience and good work ethic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m included on your list of references , right ? My praise of you could really make a difference .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , you ’ re not on it . I don ’ t think using my brother as a reference would be very convincing !
segments.speaker: S2
